Paul Stopforth bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke bi na United States ugbu a
Gọọmentị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gbochiri ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya n'ala nna ya wee gaa United States n'afọ 1988
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọkwa ya dị ka onye nkuzi na Visual and Environmental Studies na Director of Undergraduate Studies na Mahadum Harvard, ebe ọ malitere ịkụzi n'afọ 1996
Ọ bụ onye na-eleta ngalaba na School of the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston.
Stopforth gụrụ akwụkwọ na Johannesburg College of Art na Royal College of Art dị na London
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro n'ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi ngwakọta na akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ South African National Gallery chịkọtara ya kpamkpam n'afọ 1979.

N'afọ 1981 na 1983 Stopforth mere nnukwu ihe osise abụọ akpọrọ "Elegy" na "Interrogation Space #1-5" banyere Steve Biko, onye isi nke Black Consciousness Movement nke South Africa nwụrụ na 1977 site n'isi mgbe ọ nọ n'aka ndị uwe ojii

Mgbe ọnwụ Biko gasịrị, a na-ekesa foto nke onyinyo ozu ya n'ọtụtụ ebe, na-eme ka Biko ghara ịbụ mmadụ ma na-agbanwe ya ka ọ bụrụ arịa nke ndụ efu (n'iji okwu ahụ eme ihe, ahụ nke na-anọchite anya ọkwa ndụ dị ala na-abụghị nke mmepeanya, onye a napụrụ uru mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya niile ma nwee ike igbu ya n'enweghị mmetụta)
Karịsịa, ihe osise Stopforth "Elegy" na-eme ka Biko bụrụ onye nwụrụ n'ihi okwukwe ya maka mmegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ.
